Author: Arrrvin
Title: [ANN][TokenSale][Bounty] Crypto Trust Network - Solving Crypto Fraud
Body: CTN Token Sale: Unsuccessful — The future, refunds and bounties  ***Refund guide can be found here***  Hi CTN Community,  We are unfortunately at the end of our unsuccessful token sale. We firstly wanted to thank everyone who supported us by contributing to the token sale, helping sharing our dream or taking part with in bounty program.  Despite our efforts, our CTN Token Sale was unsuccessful. The sale has been a long and tough process for us — with our company pouring time, money and resources into every aspect of the project including concept, resources, marketing, development and more.  We have learnt a lot over our journey and have identified areas we were lacking — some key factors which we feel contributed to our unsuccessful token sale:  Lack of community ‘buzz’ Competing with other larger projects with advertising budgets Perceived ROI with a project containing ‘industry good’ Lack of private equity Despite the above our company and team have committed to carrying on Crypto Trust Network. The past few months has seen us inundated with stories from the community of people being scammed, phishing attempts (which we, ourselves experienced the first night of our sale) and more. This has only fueled the fire of CTN and motivated us even more to get our platform off the ground.  As such, CTN will be making a return within the next few months — we are restructuring our business model and will be offering a private equity sale before the public token sale to kick-start the platform.  Refunds Of course as we didn’t hit the softcap all CTN token holders will be eligible for a refund of their ETH. We are using an industry standard painless ERC20 refund mechanism which will allow you to retrieve the ETH you contributed to the CTN token sale. We will be doing a full blog post around this process and have support staff on hand to help with the process if required.  Bounty As our token sale was unsuccessful we will be re-launching the CTN token in the proceeding months; as such we will honor all bounty program contributors under our new structure. We will be sending our an email specifically to all our bounty hunters with more detail around this.  We are deeply appreciative for all the support from all contributors and on behalf of myself and all the team I want to apologize for failing to meet our targets; however after some re-development and private equity deals are finalized we will be back and better than ever.  Please feel free to reach our directly to me with any questions.  Jim Dowling CEO Crypto Trust Network

Title: [ANN][TokenSale][Bounty] Crypto Trust Network - Solving Crypto Fraud
Body: Thing is that I am doing my homework and my homework concludes that besides a nice concept there is little to verify anything besides one mention of Jim Dowling - CEO being related to this project. Telegram Chat is notifications only? - I haven't seen any CTN created yet by the contract? Inconsistencies and weird policies running up to the ICO - (outdated or bad information) I mean your ICO has been running since you "flicked that switch" and even before.

Author: cryptotrustnetwork
Title: [ANN][TokenSale][Bounty] Crypto Trust Network - Solving Crypto Fraud
Body: We're glad you like our concept Daruhshie.  1. The telegram is an announcement channel - one of the primary driving factors for this was to help combat potential ICO phishing attempts as we didn't have 24/7 moderation resources. 2. The CTN tokens are minted in real-time by our smart contract; as such they don't appear as a conventional transfer on etherscan - this allows us to only create the amount of tokens sold, and not be generating a large amount initially. Alongside this it has TX GAS advantages. You can confirm transaction information by querying the "balanceOf" function on our contract found here: https://etherscan.io/address/0xc77add231ef94ca78968aa6ce7e4f4474362c544#readContract and entering any of the wallet addresses that have contributed so far 3. Correct - we delayed our launch by a month due to bad timing with end of the year and unfortunately a few sites which we contacted did not update this. You can find our blog posta bout this here: https://medium.com/@cryptotrustnet/token-sale-delayed-start-22nd-january-518d102d183d 4. Correct - we had a pre-sale available which was promoted to subscribers only giving a small additional incentive bonus of tokens, this can be inspected via our token sale contract  We appreciate you following up and we're more than happy to answer any more questions. Our goal really is to be transparent here - also don't hesitate to contact us via email if you want: contact@cryptotrust.network

Author: Daruhshie
Title: [ANN][TokenSale][Bounty] Crypto Trust Network - Solving Crypto Fraud
Body: Thank you for your detailed reply. Not here to put your ico into the ground, just looking for answers to some question marks.

Author: cryptotrustnetwork
Title: [ANN][TokenSale][Bounty] Crypto Trust Network - Solving Crypto Fraud
Body: Completely understand and more than encourage your due diligence, something which is often lacking in these markets!   Quote from: Crypto_Man1212 on January 22, 2018, 08:55:55 PM Quote from: Crypto_Man1212 on January 22, 2018, 02:59:27 AM I'm guessing you're using a neural network?  I'm curious how you will get your dataset to train your neural network.  The architecture of the distributed processing is still to be defined as such we will have a specialist write a dedicated blog post around this.  However, the preliminary plan is CTN nodes taking instruction from a master-node; the master node creates 'todo lists' of blockchain data with verified, expected results to be trained on (and to ensure we're not wasting resources by doing re-work.)  The CTN node will then process the allocated work, training on it's slice of the model in order to find relationships within the data.  The output relationships from training data will be merged across nodes on the network, from here their results are verified before being consumed by the CTN Risk Rating.

Author: cryptotrustnetwork
Title: [ANN][TokenSale][Bounty] Crypto Trust Network - Solving Crypto Fraud
Body: Introducing the Crypto Trust Network   Protecting you from cryptocurrency fraud   Hello bitcointalk, we're happy to announce the launch of the Crypto Trust Network!  Crypto Trust Network, or CTN is a platform backed by a large, experienced software development company with a highly skilled team - we are offering tools allowing crypto companies such exchanges, wallets, merchants and debit card provides to help protect their customers from fraud, theft and loss.  The CTN's key feature is a metric known as the 'CTN Trust Rating' is calculated by taking data analysis, breach reports and blockchain transaction data and combing it with machine learning.  This allows our integration partners to instantly flag high risk transactions and blacklist stolen cryptocurrencies.   [Whitepaper] [Website] [Bounty] [YouTube] [Reddit] [Medium]   We're launching a token sale to kick-start this ambitious, industry leading project alongside this we're offering a very generous bounty program so you can earn CTN tokens, the currency of the network.  Helping us spread the word by making posts, articles, videos or tweets you can earn CTN tokens   Bounty Rewards   1. Blog/Article/Medium Post | Normal quality/reach Up to 20 CTN Above average quality/reach Up to 50 CTN Exceptional quality/reach Up to 50+ CTN Mention/partial 1-50 CTN  2. YouTube/Video Normal quality/reach Up to 30 CTN Above average quality/reach Up to 75 CTN Exceptional quality/reach Up to 75+ CTN Mention/partial 1-50 CTN  3. Bitcointalk/Fourms posts + translations Normal quality/reach Up to 15 CTN Above average quality/reach Up to 25 CTN Exceptional quality/reach Up to 25+ CTN Mention/partial 1-25 CTN   4. Twitter Posts & follows | Follow + hashtag + Post (up to 3) 200-500 followers 3 CTN per post Follow + hashtag + Post (up to 3) 500-100 followers 5 CTN per post Follow + hashtag + Post (up to 3) 1000+ followers 7 CTN per post Special sponsored post contact us   For more information, questions and to see what we're all about please check out cryptotrust.network    For questions about the bounty please contact us at: bounties@cryptotrust.network and submit via the form on our website  https://i.imgur.com/ut5mnPh.png

While the intention is to offer tools for wallets, exchanges and debit card providers by utilizing the token we can have an anonymous, open way to access the platform data.
